summary: Frontend testing for hierarchical location system. All features verified: Location Manager visible in admin sidebar, page loads with correct stats (13 countries, 55 regions, 79 districts, 130 cities), countries table displays flags/codes/names, Add Country button visible, drill-down to regions works. RadiusSelector component confirmed max 250km.

issues: Minor: MUI Grid deprecation warnings for 'item', 'xs', 'sm' props - cosmetic, not affecting functionality

critical_code_review_comments: Layout.tsx line 89: Location Manager correctly added to menuItems with Place icon and path /dashboard/locations
locations/page.tsx: Full CRUD implementation with stats cards, breadcrumb navigation, and hierarchical drill-down
RadiusSelector.tsx: PRESET_RADII=[5,10,25,50,100,150,250] and maximumValue=250 confirmed - max 250km as required
API endpoints /api/admin/locations/stats and /api/admin/locations/countries returning correct data
seed_data_creation: None - used existing location data (13 countries seeded)
